VIII.iv.3.C.1.b
.
Applicability of the Concept of Average Impairment in Earning Capacity to IU Claims
Do
not
apply the concept of average impairment in earning capacity set forth in
38 CFR 4.1
to determinations regarding IU.Â  This concept applies only to determinations of the percentage of disability for schedular evaluations.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
